name: Crab grab
description:
Love grabbing shiny things? Always wanted to be a crab? Then this is the game for you! Grab as many clams as you can to become the reigning crab champion!

Use the arrow keys to grab clams and move around to collect points. This has only been tested on a Windows 10 but should still work on other versions of Windows.

HOORAY!    

Crab grab has now reached 2.1! Here is a list of the features

   

  1. Added a texture for the timer so you will now know how much time you have left.
  2. Extended the timer’s time.
  3. Added fizzy drink cans which will takeaway your score by one.
  4. Added a cool new animation for when you collect clams and golden clams.
  5. Added a cool new animation for a new feature called the Crab bag.
  6. Made the menu’s title a little better.
  7. The crab should no longer be able to leave the area by spam clicking.
  8. Added some music!
  9. Made the game screen a little bit smaller so people with smaller screens can play it.

                                                                                                                                                              

IMPORTANT!

Remember to report any bugs that you come across.
